member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE
member.summary: Defines values for the currently known media types supported by IMAPI.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The disc recorder contains an unknown media type or the recorder is empty.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_CDROM
member.summary: The drive contains CD-ROM or CD-R/RW media.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_CDR
member.summary: The drive contains write once (CD-R) media.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_CDRW
member.summary: The drive contains rewritable (CD-RW) media.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDROM
member.summary: Either the DVD drive or DVD media is read-only.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDRAM
member.summary: The drive contains DVD-RAM media.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDPLUSR
member.summary: The drive contains write once media that supports the DVD plus format (DVD+R) .

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDPLUSRW
member.summary: The drive contains rewritable media that supports the DVD plus format (DVD+RW).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDPLUSR_DUALLAYER
member.summary: The drive contains write once dual layer media that supports the DVD plus format (DVD+R DL).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDDASHR
member.summary: The drive contains write once media that supports the DVD dash format (DVD-R).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDDASHRW
member.summary: The drive contains rewritable media that supports the DVD dash format (DVD-RW).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDDASHR_DUALLAYER
member.summary: The drive contains write once dual layer media that supports the DVD dash format (DVD-R DL).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DISK
member.summary: The drive contains a media type that supports random-access writes. This media type supports hardware defect management that identifies and avoids using damaged tracks.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_DVDPLUSRW_DUALLAYER
member.summary: The drive contains rewritable dual layer media that supports the DVD plus format (DVD+RW DL).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_HDDVDROM
member.summary: The drive contains high definition read only DVD media (HD DVD-ROM).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_HDDVDR
member.summary: The drive contains write once high definition media (HD DVD-R).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_HDDVDRAM
member.summary: The drive contains random access high definition media (HD DVD-RAM).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_BDROM
member.summary: The drive contains read only Blu-ray media (BD-ROM).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_BDR
member.summary: The drive contains write once Blu-ray media (BD-R).

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_BDRE
member.summary: The drive contains rewritable Blu-ray media (BD-RE) media.

member.name: IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.IMAPI_MEDIA_TYPE_MAX
member.summary: This value is the maximum value defined in IMAPI_MEDIA_PHYSICAL_TYPE.
